title: Accessing a URL with no webapps deployed returns 200 OK instead of 404
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return an HTTP error 404 page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the instance
4. Observe that the server returns a 200 OK response code instead of a 404 error page.
